name: S P L A S H - 8 0 - Y
name_original: S P L A S H - 8 0 - Y
description:
A Splashy mobile fangame with retro-futuristic style.

How to play :

Slide your finger across the screen to move the ball left and right

Music from Violet Delta :

Check out his bancamp too : https://violetdelta.bandcamp.com/
It's very nice stuff in my opinion ! <3
